data.title: LinkedIn
data.meta_description:
CRY | 394 followers on LinkedIn. Narrative-driven commercials and films that grab audience's emotions. | Cry is an independent, full-service creative production house that works with clients who want to incorporate creative collaboration to make incredible video advertising, brand content, and films.

At Cry we create compelling visual narratives for clients and their audiences by delivering agile thought leadership and breakthrough creative.
 
We believe that most brands have not fully explored the possibilities of their narrative, and we are in the business of elevating brands to entirely new levels through visual storytelling.
data.text:
New Cry reel! ðŸ‘€ We did so much incredible work over the last year that we are thrilled to include in our new reel. Check it out!

Today on the Filmmakers in Advertising podcast, Codey S. Wilson chats with Colin Jeffery, Chief Creative Officer at Doner and Co-Founder & Chief Creative Officer at Wolfgang, LLC. Colin was instrumental in helping Kia Motors become one of the fastest-growing car brands in the world, taking them from 28th to 7th largest automotive brand in the US. Colin created the wildly popular Kia Hamsters which helped catapult the brand into pop culture. The long-standing campaign includes one of the most viewed commercials of all-time, according to AdWeek. This episode is packed full of wisdom and heart. We canâ€™t wait for you to hear it. Listen on Apple Podcasts, Pocket Casts, & Spotify. See the show notes and links at https://lnkd.in/e8CZ7wJj. #Filmmaking #advertising #filmmakersinadvertising #podcast

Take a look at the process of making one of our recent spots from initial creative, to storyboarding, all the way through making the final spot come to life. We really enjoyed working on the Good Ol' Days with FABLE Advertising and love showing our process on our website. Check it out: https://lnkd.in/dKiPyHtb.

Today on the Filmmakers in Advertising podcast, Codey S. Wilson chats with Philip K. and Stanton Hill of Battery. Battery has worked with EA Games, Land Oâ€™Lakes, Netflix, Royal Bank of Canada and Warner Bros. Battery is a lead creative agency of the Paris-based Havas Group with offices in Los Angeles, Chicago, Toronto and Shanghai. This episode is packed with wisdom from Phil and Stanâ€™s combined experience. Listen on Apple Podcasts, Pocket Casts, & Spotify. See the show notes and links at https://lnkd.in/ehiKMkMZ.

Today on the Filmmakers In Advertising podcast, Monica Arsenault chats with Megan Cunningham, founder of Magnet Media, Inc. Magnet Media is a brand storytelling studio that believes the best way to drive measurable growth outcomes is to use storytelling and data. In this episode, we talk to Megan about everything from leveraging tech knowledge to the biggest mistake filmmakers make when approaching brands; we also chat about how Meganâ€™s passion for storytelling developed and some fundamentals of Magnet Mediaâ€™s mission and strategy. Listen on Apple Podcasts, Pocket Casts, & Spotify. See the show notes and links at https://lnkd.in/eCPKXnJM: https://lnkd.in/eRy_fq5A
